=== My Ubuntu History ===
I think there is a good community (Ubuntu) + company (Canonical) relationship and balance. I appreciate all the hard work made by developers, promoters and end-users to make Ubuntu a great distro that I use for everyday activities. Hence, I would like to contribute more in the near future.
